SELECT DISTINCT c.* FROM kb_card c LEFT JOIN kb_board b ON c.board_id = b.board_id LEFT JOIN kb_board_member m ON c.board_id = m.board_id WHERE (c.executor_id IS NULL OR c.executor_id = 0) AND c.status != '2' AND ( b.user_id = #{userId} OR m.user_id = #{userId} OR c.create_by = (SELECT login_name FROM sys_user WHERE user_id = #{userId}) )
AND c.card_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{cardTitle}, '%')
ORDER BY c.create_time DESC

SELECT IFNULL((SELECT count(1) FROM kb_card WHERE executor_id = #{userId}), 0) as total, IFNULL((SELECT count(1) FROM kb_card WHERE executor_id = #{userId} AND status = '0'), 0) as pending, IFNULL((SELECT count(1) FROM kb_card WHERE executor_id = #{userId} AND status = '1'), 0) as done, IFNULL((SELECT count(1) FROM kb_card WHERE executor_id = #{userId} AND status = '0' AND deadline < NOW()), 0) as overdue, IFNULL((SELECT count(1) FROM kb_card WHERE executor_id = #{userId} AND status = '0' AND DATEDIFF(deadline, NOW()) = 1), 0) as tomorrow, IFNULL((SELECT count(DISTINCT c.card_id) FROM kb_card c LEFT JOIN kb_board_member m ON c.board_id = m.board_id WHERE (c.executor_id IS NULL OR c.executor_id = 0) AND c.status = '0' AND (m.user_id = #{userId} OR c.create_by = (SELECT login_name FROM sys_user WHERE user_id = #{userId})) ), 0) as unassigned
WHERE executor_id = #{userId} AND status = '0' AND deadline BETWEEN NOW() AND DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) ORDER BY deadline ASC
SELECT count(1) FROM sys_user_message WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_read = '0'
select user_id as userId, user_name as userName from sys_user where status = '0' order by create_time desc
select card_id from kb_card where list_id = #{listId} order by order_num asc, card_id asc
